text: Dongwon Institute of Science and Technology is a private college located in Yangsan City, South Gyeongsang province, South Korea. It was called Yangsan College until August 2013. ==See also== *List of colleges and universities in South Korea ==External links== *Dongwon Institute of Science and Technology website Category:Universities and colleges in South Gyeongsang Province
title: Dongwon Institute of Science and Technology
